articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Sania Mirza ends her career with 1st round defeat at WTA Dubai event - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Sania Mirza lost in straight sets along with American partner Madison Keys in women's doubles tie. The pair went 4-6 0-6 down to the formidable Russian pair of Vernokia Kudermetova and Liudmila Samsonova in exactly one hour. | Tennis News
articles.content: Indian tennis icon Sania Mirza on Tuesday ended her glorious 20-year-long career with a defeat in the first round of the Dubai Duty Free Tennis Championships. She lost in straight sets along with Ame… [+1321 chars]
